overview: During the years 1967 and 1969, Byron collected images and experimented with abstractions.  Inkaboos was created during this period. It was made from hand-made inkblots that, according to Byron, were shot to animate as strange bat-like creatures. Inkaboos features a mix of many colors.  In one scene, inkblots appear in yellow,  in the next they appear in blue, and in some scenes they are appear as a blend of three or more colors.
title: Inkaboos
